text: “Gei di hai o Zedekiah, go di king o Judah, digau aamua, mo digau Jerusalem ala ne dubu i golo ala e noho i lodo tenua deenei, be guu hula gi Egypt, ko Au go Dimaadua, Au gaa hai dagu hai ang gi digaula gii hai digaula be nia huwa golee ‘fig’ aanei ala koia gu huaidu huoloo, gei gu huaidu dono gai.
